abstract: Sesac settles antitrust lawsuit with Radio Music Licensing Committee; Sesac will for first time be subject to arbitration over royalty rates it charges radio stations.
lead_paragraph: According to the deal, if Sesac cannot agree with the committee on fees, they will be set by a third party. Sesac must also pay $3.6 million in legal costs.

headline.main: Sesac Settles Antitrust Lawsuit Over Royalty Rates
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Sesac Settles Antitrust Lawsuit Over Royalty Fees for Stations

snippet: According to the deal, if Sesac cannot agree with the committee on fees, they will be set by a third party. Sesac must also pay $3.6 million in legal costs.
